about_the_game:
Welcome to Razed Earth, a game based in desperate conflict fought by private armies trying to make a home in the last habitable areas of this world. Within Razed Earth you'll find yourself fighting by land or air, in various warzones. This is a sandbox, casual shooter allowing you freedom to wreak havoc within a large open battlezone!

From barren cities to arctic tundras, you'll have to work either alone or with friends to take down enemy bases, artillery pieces or anti-air placements. Each base comes with its own objectives and random placement, to create a varied and enjoyable playing experience. Throughout the battle, new events will be placed around the map giving you new challenges in an ever evolving battlefield.

Boots on the ground

As a commando unit, you can parachute in wherever you want. Drop in, complete the objectives then use the balloon system to take you back up to the skies to drop somewhere else. Choose from an array of weapons, and create a loadout which you're most deadly with.

Take to the skies

Build your plane how you need it. Support your team by providing coordinated strikes to ground locations or by destroying menacing air units. Fight how you want.

Your arsenal, your way

A true sandbox experience giving you the reigns to building your plane how you want it. The only limit with your plane or commando loadout is weight. Tailor everything to fit your play style.

Features

  • Ground and air combat
  • Weight limited loadout system with attachments
  • Plane customisation with wide array of varied weapons
  • Large, open and varied maps
  • Play alone or with friends
  • Different enemy and plane types
  • Different engagement types, from ambushes to prison camps
  • Destructible turrets on planes, shoot them to take them out!
  • The ability to eject from your plane should you need it

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains potentially distressing situations regarding weapons of war which use fire/toxic gas. There are frequent blood and fire effects. There are also enemies who will perform suicide attacks which may trigger some players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64x
  • Processor: Intel I3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 740 GeForce
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64x
  • Processor: Intel I5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1070Ti GeForce
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 13 GB available space

short_description: A first person sandbox shooter, where you can fight in either the sky above or on the ground. Customise your plane's arsenal how you want it. Build a loadout tailored to your play style. Razed Earth is a simple yet liberating sandbox experience built to be played by anyone.
